Returns:

public static java.lang.String asString(org.w3c.dom.Node n,
                                        java.util.Properties p)
                                 throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Generate a string from the XML Node, using the specified output properties.

Parameters:
n - The node to transform
p - The output properties to use for the transformation
Returns:
A string representation of the XML
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if there was an error transforming the XML

asString

public static java.lang.String asString(org.w3c.dom.Node n)
                                 throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Transform an XML Node into a String

Parameters:
n - The node to transform
Returns:
The string representation of that node.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - If an error occured during the transform.
